oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Finding faces in color images using wavelet transform
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KARLEKAR, JAYASHREE
DESAI, UB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: face recognition
image colour analysis
image resolution
wavelet transforms
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, a new fast method for detecting human faces in color images using the wavelet transform is proposed. The face detection algorithm has three stages, where chrominance, shape and frequency information are used respectively. The algorithm starts at the lower resolution version of the image obtained from the wavelet transform, so that the amount of data to be processed is greatly reduced. Experimental results show that the human face in color images can be detected regardless of orientation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the International Conference on Image Analysis and Processing, Venice, Italy, 27-29 September 1999, 1085-1088
